meanings.definition: The act of servicing something again.
meanings.sent1: The reservicing of the car was necessary to keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: After the reservicing, the computer worked like new.
meanings.sent3: The reservicing of the old bicycle turned it into a shiny, like-new ride.
meanings.sent4: Her reservicing of the recipe added a fresh twist to the classic dish.
meanings.sent5: The reservicing of the garden transformed it into a vibrant oasis.

meanings.definition: The process of maintaining or repairing something that has already been serviced.
meanings.sent1: Reservicing of the machinery is crucial to prevent breakdowns.
meanings.sent2: The reservicing of the HVAC system improved its efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The reservicing of the clock made it tick backwards for a day!
meanings.sent4: His reservicing of the car was like giving it a second chance at life.
meanings.sent5: The reservicing of the painting brought out hidden details and colors.
